sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"不重要的，次要的"之意。
means: marginal ： 指处于边缘，幅度、范围小，故价值或重要性不大。
minor ： 多指与别的比较后显得不重要，或指较少、较小。
negligible ： 指数量小，不重要，微不足道或可忽略不计。
minimal ： 指最少、最低或最小。

sentence.Network_en: The company says the cost of relocation will be negligible.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司称搬迁的费用可以忽略不计。

sentence.Network_en: Senior managers are convinced that the strike will have a negligible impact.
sentence.Network_cn: 高层主管们相信罢工的影响微不足道。

sentence.Network_en: The practical inconveniences of long hair are negligible.
sentence.Network_cn: 长发在实际生活中产生的不便可以忽略不计。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... necessitate vt. 迫使,使成为必需,需要 negligible a. 微不足道的 nickel n. 镍；镍币.
光电英语_百度文库 ... susceptible： 易受影响的 ： negligible： 可以忽略的 ： radiate： 辐射 ：.
SAT官方指南OG阅读真题10套 - 豆丁网 ... muted adj. 静音 negligible adj. 可忽略的... advanced adj. 增加了.
GRE数学词汇 - 豆丁网 ... negative number 负数 negligible 可忽略不计的 n-gon n- 边形.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from obsolete French, from négliger 'to neglect'

entry.tran: 微不足道的;可忽略不计的
entry.def: An amount or effect that is negligible is so small that it is not worth considering or worrying about.

example.ex: The pay that the soldiers received was negligible...
example.tran: 士兵拿到的军饷少得可怜。

example.ex: Senior managers are convinced that the strike will have a negligible impact.
example.tran: 高层主管们相信罢工的影响微不足道。

means.word_mean: 1. so small as to be meaningless; insignificant;

sentences.sentence: "he considered the prize too paltry for the lives it must cost"

auth_sentence.content: If the error is small, it is negligible.
auth_sentence.res_content: If the error is small, it is negligible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If the error is small, it is negligible.

auth_sentence.content: We may appear ludicrously pretentious; our numbers negligible.
auth_sentence.res_content: We may appear ludicrously pretentious; our numbers negligible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We may appear ludicrously pretentious; our numbers negligible.

auth_sentence.content: In relation to the Sun, planetary mass is negligible.
auth_sentence.res_content: In relation to the Sun, planetary mass is negligible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In relation to the Sun, planetary mass is negligible.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可忽略不计的,微不足道的
stems_affixes.word_buile: neg否认,不用;没有+lig选择+ible能……的→能不用选择的→可以忽视的
abnegate[v.放弃]+ion表名词→n.拒绝;克己,自制
neg否认,不用;没有+lig选择+ence表名词→不用选择→忽略

stems_affixes.value_cn: 商议, 谈判, 流通
stems_affixes.word_buile: negotiate[v.商议, 谈判, 磋商,买卖]+ion表名词→negotiation商议, 谈判
re反+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
neg否认,不用;没有+lect选择→不用选择→忽略
neg否认,不用;没有+ate表动词→v.取消,否认

stems_affixes.value_cn: 商议, 谈判, 磋商,买卖
stems_affixes.word_buile: neg不+oti+ate做→不能做出决定→商议, 谈判
re反+neg否认,不用;没有+e→反过来否认→背信

means.word_mean: 可忽略的, 无足轻重的;微不足道的；不重要的；不值一提的

sentences.en: He is a negligible person in the government.
sentences.cn: 在政府中他是个微不足道的人。

sentences.en: There is a negligible difference in meaning between these two words.
sentences.cn: 这两个词之间在意义上差别是极小的。

sentences.en: There was a negligible amount of rain in that region last year.
sentences.cn: 去年在那个地区只有轻微的雨量。

sentences.en: The damage to my car is negligible.
sentences.cn: 我的汽车的损坏程度可忽略不计。

sentences.en: His knowledge of English is negligible.
sentences.cn: 他的英语知识少得可怜。

sentences.en: The difference between your wages and mine is negligible.
sentences.cn: 你的工资和我的工资差别很小。

sentences.en: In buying a suit, a difference of ten cents in price is negligible.
sentences.cn: 买一套衣服只差一角钱是无所谓的。

jushi.english: There was a negligible amount of rain in that region last year.
jushi.chinese: 去年在那个地区只有轻微的雨量。

jushi.english: He is a negligible person in the government.
jushi.chinese: 在政府中他是个微不足道的人。

jushi.english: There is a negligible difference in meaning between these two words.
jushi.chinese: 这两个词之间在意义上差别是极小的。
